name: Princess & Pup
description:
A short story based adventure made for Miz Jam 2020

Princess wants a pup but her parents, King and Queen, will not let her. Join her on a journey to get her very own pup and help her sneak it into the castle without getting caught. The pup will only follow you if you place  treats for it to eat. 

Controls

Keyboard

  • WASD - Move
  • E - Talk/Interact
  • Spacebar - Place treat
  • F - Pickup/Throw rock

Controller

  • Left stick - Move
  • A - Talk/Interact
  • B - Place treat
  • X - Pickup/Throw rock

Made by Elaine Gómez and Ben Sanchez
